Author: so_crat_ic
Text: Its easy to have a bias, its not so easy to see it, or get rid of it. Youre half way there!  I do something similar. The way I got around this. Is first I make a bowl for myself. Then I give it to someone else. Then I make another bowl for myself, and give it to someone else. Because I cant guess what other people want. Helps put my own portions in perspective. And everyone else is happy with the result.
